com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_client

Class StampedeBuildClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_client.StampedeBuildClient

  • public class StampedeBuildClient
extends Object
    Orchestrates the different parts of the build that run on client that launched Stampede. This includes local build phases (racing, synchronized), and monitoring of distributed build.
